messages.subject: I'm selling 27 "mature" but brand new Broderbund software classics
messages.msgSnippet: I ve got a big box here of 27 mostly brand new, still shrink wrapped Broderbund games, etc.  Almost all of them are on 3.5 disks, some even include the 5.25
messages.messageBody:
I've got a big box here of 27 mostly brand new, still shrink wrapped
Broderbund games, etc. Almost all of them are on 3.5" disks, some
even include the 5.25" disks. Does anyone use these things anymore?
I hate to throw them away. The bid right now is only $1.00 and I have
no takers. Shipping/handling/insurance will be about $17.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=2060738056&rd=1

Auction closes tomorrow. If they don't sell, any ideas on who I
can give them to?

Carolyn
